name: F1 Racing Championship
description:
F1 Racing Championship is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubi Soft Shanghai and Ubi Soft Milan. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
F1 Racing Championship is available on Dreamcast, PlayStation, PlayStation 2 and Nintendo 64.
